alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 5:56PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Austin, northern Fort Bend, southern Waller and northwestern Harris Counties through 715 PM CST... At 556 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sealy, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Katy, Jersey Village, Sealy, Brookshire, Addicks Park Ten, Spring Branch West, Spring Branch North, Hockley, San Felipe, Pattison, Cypress, Westbranch and Monaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southeastern Texas.
